_ PRO1SG.NOM two-POSS.1SG take-FUT-1SG and PRO2SG.DAT how.much one.needs
imtwordsbare: _ PRO1SG.NOM two-POSS.1SG take-FUT-1SG and PRO2SG.DAT how.much one.needs
rightsholder: Gusev, Valentin; Klooster, Tiina; Wagner-Nagy, Beáta. 2023. “INEL Kamas Corpus.” Version 2.0. Publication date 2023-12-31. http://hdl.handle.net/11022/0000-0007-FC25-4
srcwordsbare: _ măn šide-m i-li-m a tănan kumən kereʔ
trs: I will take two [wolves], and you, how many do you need?"

html:
dĭgəttə poʔto saʔmə-luʔ-pi da volk-əndə naʔamzum amno-sʼtə
then goat.[NOM.SG] fall-MOM-PST.[3SG] and wolf-LAT/LOC.3SG
rightsholder: Gusev, Valentin; Klooster, Tiina; Wagner-Nagy, Beáta. 2023. “INEL Kamas Corpus.” Version 2.0. Publication date 2023-12-31. http://hdl.handle.net/11022/0000-0007-FC25-4
srcwordsbare: dĭgəttə poʔto saʔmə-luʔ-pi da volk-əndə naʔamzum amno-sʼtə
trs: Then the goat fell down and (?) on the wolf.

html:
dĭgəttə dĭ _ nereʔ-luʔ-pi
then this.[NOM.SG] _ frighten-MOM-PST.[3SG]

html:
dĭ-zeŋ nereʔ-luʔ-pi-ʔi i nuʔmə-luʔ-pi-ʔi
this-PL frighten-MOM-PST-3PL and run-MOM-PST-3PL
rightsholder: Gusev, Valentin; Klooster, Tiina; Wagner-Nagy, Beáta. 2023. “INEL Kamas Corpus.” Version 2.0. Publication date 2023-12-31. http://hdl.handle.net/11022/0000-0007-FC25-4
trs: They got scared and ran away.
